nodes.text: Melodic Order was a group of Alderaanian musicians who lived and performed on the planet Naboo during the Galactic Civil War. Their primary locale was Club Deeja in the city of Keren. The group took a cloister vow, swearing to only interact with other Alderaanians so as to not let non-Alderaanians influence their music. Following the destruction of Alderaan, Melodic Order became a target of the Galactic Empire and were rescued by Princess Leia Organa.
